title: Cannot connect to league of legends servers
body: Hey admins, I have been trying to connect to league for the past 3 days and the problem i am having is, the league client is telling me i am not connected to the internet even though i am. I saw multiple posts about this but none of the solutions have worked. I have tried deleting the notepad line that did not work. I also stream this game daily so this does affect my financial situation if there is anyway I can resolve this matter and get back to pentakilling the enemy team that would be great.

replies.body: I've got a few steps outlined in [**this sticky post**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/hF8EV88W-were-unable-to-log-you-in-because-you-may-be-offline) that's up. If those steps aren't helping, no worries just yet, we've still got another trick up our sleeve. This other method is a little tricky, so we'd like to walk players through this one on one in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
I've been having this same issue for the past 2 days. I'm very upset and this is affecting my mental health. This is a top priority issue and needs to be solved post freaking haste !!!!!!!!!
